description:
IF YOUR PROJECTS are complex, time-bound, requiring high quality, tight budgets, 100s of moving parts, demanding customers - then you NEED this course. Learn to use Microsoft Project like an EXPERT. This is NOT a simplistic point-and-click feature course.

This course teaches you to identify issues, analyze them, seek multiple resolutions - and apply them - all using Microsoft Project 2016.

Impeccable curriculum, exhaustive topic coverage, holistic teaching - taught from the ABSOLUTE BASICS to ADVANCED TECHNIQUES:

NO OTHER book, tutorial or course offers these unique set, anywhere on the internet:

  1. Brings together Microsoft Project, Project Management principles and Real Life Exercises
  2. Use Project in EVERY STAGE of project management - Initiation, Planning, Execution & Control - and finally Closing.
  3. Completely HANDS-ON, 100% subtitled
  4. 100+ downloadable exercise files
  5. 10 real life exercises from a wide variety of domains - Administration, Business, Technology, HR, Civil PM, Marketing, IT/Software
  6. Identify REAL LIFE problems - scheduling, costing, resourcing, work allocations!
  7. LOADED with tips, tricks, pitfalls from years of hands-on experience
  8. Use REPORTS - powerful, automated, DYNAMIC reports and dashboards
  9. Resolve Resource Overallocations 8+ techniques: Assign to different resources, Push dates - Adding Delays, Increase working hours, Balance allocations, Leveling, Work Contours, Use Team Planner view, Use "Assign Resources" feature, Splitting Tasks
title: Microsoft Project 2016: The MASTERCLASS
